EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Date Change - Toronto
EmailTemplate.subject: Date Change for Leader’s Guide Workshop in Toronto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop, originally scheduled to take place July 21st in Toronto.
Due to unforeseen circumstances, we must change the date from July 21st to Tuesday, July 26th. The location and agenda remain the same. We apologize for any inconvenience and hope you will still be able to attend.
Please let us know if you are able to attend on the new date of Tuesday, July 26th by replying to this email with:
Yes, I can attend OR No, I can't attend
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale NEW DATE: Tuesday, July 26th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/toronto]]>
Location Pivotal Toronto <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/toronto]]> 1 Toronto Street 11th Floor Toronto, Ontario M5C-2V6 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+Toronto+St,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada/@43.6499693,-79.3778347,17z/data=!4m13!1m7!3m6!1s0x89d4cb323c4430a5:0x1734827663017a61!2s1+Toronto+St,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada!3b1!8m2!3d43.6499654!4d-79.375646!3m4!1s0x89d4cb323c4430a5:0x1734827663017a61!8m2!3d43.6499654!4d-79.375646]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
